Package org.example.model

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.Unit
org.example.model.Enemy
public class Enemy extends Unit
Represents an enemy unit in the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Rectangle
    hitbox
    The hitbox of the enemy (not serialized).
    boolean
    isGrounded
    Flag indicating if the enemy is grounded.
    Random
    random
    A random number generator for the enemy's behavior.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String type, int health, int currentHealth, int attack, int speed, Coordinates coordinates, boolean isAlive)
      Constructs a new Enemy object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the enemy
      health - the health points of the enemy
      attack - the attack power of the enemy
      speed - the movement speed of the enemy
      coordinates - the initial coordinates of the enemy
      isAlive - the status indicating if the enemy is alive
